:::{#summary}
I am a Postdoc Research Associate in Economics at Heriot-Watt University, 
specializing in applied economics. 

My current projects explore:

* transport decarbonisation
* labour mismatch 
* gender wage gap 
* two-sided matching
* workers' preferences
* applications of machine learning in economics
